extension.summary: Repository which hosts custom versions of add-on's and the Wizard for the Ultra Android TV users.
extension.description: Contains Addons and the respective updates and patches them automatically without the use of the wizard to update your build. The updates may be somewhat behind the official release as this is done in order to ensure they are reliable and modified to suit the build and end user better. [CR] [CR]Be advised. removing this may be highly detrimental to the system.
